class.name: MaxIter

javadoc.text: Maximum number of iterations performed by an (iterative) algorithm.
Gets the maximum number of evaluations.
Factory method that creates instance of this class that represents * a virtually unlimited number of iterations.
javadoc.return: a new instance suitable for allowing {@link Integer#MAX_VALUE}evaluations.
